thread.title: Donald Trump Tweet UC Berkley Protest No Federal Funds
thread.title_full: Donald Trump Tweet UC Berkley Protest No Federal Funds

author: Fox News Insider
title: Donald Trump Tweet UC Berkley Protest No Federal Funds
text:
TONIGHT on Fox News: Milo Yiannopoulos joins Tucker at 9pm ET, followed by VP Mike Pence on "Hannity" at 10pm ET. Trump Threatens Fed Funds After Violent Protests at UC-Berkeley Over Milo Speech // anti-trump protests 
President Donald Trump has threatened the possible removal of federal funds to UC-Berkeley following violent protests Wednesday night on the campus. 
Conservative activist and journalist Milo Yiannopoulos was forced to cancel a speaking engagement at the university after the protests broke out. 
Thursday morning, Trump sent the following tweet: If U.C. Berkeley does not allow free speech and practices violence on innocent people with a different point of view - NO FEDERAL FUNDS? 
â€” Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) February 2, 2017 
Yiannopoulos said he was evacuated from campus after protesters turned violent. 
Would Trump be justified in removing federal funding to UC-Berkeley if these actions continue? Tell us your thoughts in the comments section. Subscribe
